meta.videoTitle: How to Improve Oral Health & Its Critical Role in Brain & Body Health

paragraphList.text_en: Promoting a healthy gut microbiome can have a direct impact on preventing and healing canker sores. The link between the gut microbiome and oral microbiome plays a significant role in the formation of canker sores. To support a healthy gut microbiome, it is recommended to consume one to four servings of low sugar fermented foods per day. These foods can include items such as yogurt, kefir, kimchi, and kombucha. Additionally, incorporating enough prebiotic fiber into the diet, either through fruits and vegetables or supplements, can further support gut health. In cases of dysbiosis or after taking antibiotics, probiotic supplements may also be beneficial, although they should not be taken consistently.
paragraphList.text_zh: 促进健康的肠道微生物组可以对预防和治愈溃疡产生直接影响。肠道微生物组和口腔微生物组之间的联系在溃疡疮的形成中起着重要作用。为了支持健康的肠道微生物组，建议每天食用一到四份低糖发酵食品。这些食物可以包括酸奶、开菲尔、泡菜和康普茶等。此外，通过水果、蔬菜或补充剂，在饮食中加入足够的益生元纤维，可以进一步支持肠道健康。在生物失调的情况下或服用抗生素后，益生菌补充剂也可能是有益的，尽管它们不应该持续服用。

paragraphList.text_en: In addition to gut health, adequate sleep is crucial for overall well-being, including the prevention of canker sores. Dr. Mark Burhen, a respected figure in the field of dental and oral health, emphasizes the importance of getting at least 6 to 8 hours of quality sleep each night. Sleep not only supports the health of the gut and oral microbiome but also has a positive impact on mental health, physical health, and performance.
paragraphList.text_zh: 除了肠道健康，充足的睡眠对整体健康至关重要，包括预防溃疡。Mark Burhen博士是牙科和口腔健康领域备受尊敬的人物，他强调每晚至少睡6到8小时的高质量睡眠的重要性。睡眠不仅有助于肠道和口腔微生物组的健康，而且对心理健康、身体健康和表现也有积极影响。

paragraphList.text_en: Considering the advice from experts like Dr. Burhen, it is clear that focusing on both gut health and quality sleep is essential in preventing and healing canker sores. By incorporating low sugar fermented foods into the diet and prioritizing sufficient sleep, individuals can support their overall health and well-being, indirectly benefiting their oral health as well. The interconnectedness of gut health, sleep, and oral health underscores the importance of a holistic approach to maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
paragraphList.text_zh: 考虑到Burhen博士等专家的建议，很明显，关注肠道健康和高质量睡眠对预防和治疗溃疡病至关重要。通过将低糖发酵食品纳入饮食中，并优先考虑充足的睡眠，个人可以支持他们的整体健康和幸福，间接有益于他们的口腔健康。肠道健康、睡眠和口腔健康的相互联系强调了保持健康生活方式的整体方法的重要性。
